name: Stell-A-Sketch
overview: Stell-A-Sketch/Okie Dokie comes on a tape or disc and contains 2 games. The tape version has one on each side. Side A contains Stell-A-Sketch, a program that simulates the Etch-A-Sketch toy on an Atari 2600 with a Starpath Supercharger. You can use either the joystick or Indy 500 driving controller to draw with. Side B contains the puzzle game Okie Dokie.
